input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp, 60"

Item keywords:
Lamp Dimensions: 14 x 14 x 9.5-Inch
Officially Licensed Art on Both Sides of Each Polyresin Lamp Shade
Metal Hardware and Chain, Cord Mounted ON/OFF Switch,2 Hanging Chains with Hanging Hardware Measure 53.5-Inch in Length Each
110V Household Outlets, Recommended Bulb Wattage: 60W (Requires 3 Bulbs, Not Included),Three Prong Cord Measures 58-Inch in Length
Overall Dimensions: 14 x 60 x 9.5-Inch

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Brighten up your game room with this officially licensed United States Army three shade lamp. The lamp is made of polyresin and features a double-sided design with the United States Army logo on one side and a military-themed design on the other. The metal hardware and chain, along with the cord mounted on/off switch, add durability and convenience. The two hanging chains with hanging hardware measure 53.5 inches in length each, and the three-prong cord measures 58 inches in length. The recommended bulb wattage is 60 watts, and the lamp is designed to fit into 110V household outlets. Overall dimensions: 14 x 60 x 9.5 inches. This lamp is a great way to show your military pride and add some light to your game room, office, or home.
input_text.Response B: Your house will feel like a gameroom with this 60” United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp. The metal lamp features officially licensed art on both sides of each polyresin shade, as well as a cord mounted ON/OFF switch. The hanging chains and hardware are also metal and come with extra length at 53.5” each. The three bulb lamp requires bulbs with a recommended wattage of 60W (not included) and has a three prong cord with a 58” length. The entire lamp measures 14” x 60” x 9.5” and will brighten up any room.
